sentences.en: A handful of pebbles in the bottom of a flowerpot will help drainage.
sentences.cn: 在花盆底下放一把鹅卵石能够帮助排水。

sentences.en: a plan to improve the town’s drainage system
sentences.cn: 改善城里排水系统的计划

sentences.en: After twenty - four hours free drainage, there was little difference in moisture content.
sentences.cn: 24小时不排水, 湿度则几乎没什么不同.

sentences.en: Bad drainage caused the land to be flooded.
sentences.cn: 排水不利容易使土地淹水.

sentences.en: Drainage is certainly indicated because of the probability of bile leakage.
sentences.cn: 由于有胆漏的可能性,引流肯定是需要的.

sentences.en: Drainage was to the north and individual channels bifurcate in that direction.
sentences.cn: 整个水系向北排水,各个河道朝该方向分叉.

sentences.en: Drainage water analyses may not indicate the composition of soil solutions accurately.
sentences.cn: 排水分析不能正确地反映土壤溶液的组成.

sentences.en: It has been impossible to anticipate the amount of bile drainage.
sentences.cn: 预计胆汁的引流量是不可能的.

sentences.en: It is advisable to mix coarse grit into heavy soil to improve drainage.
sentences.cn: 建议将粗砂掺到黏重的土壤里，以提高排水性能。

sentences.en: It is wise to start infilling with a layer of gravel for drainage.
sentences.cn: 先铺上一层利于排水的砾石是个明智的做法。

sentences.en: Line the pots with pebbles to ensure good drainage.
sentences.cn: 在罐子里铺一层鹅卵石，以确保排水良好。

sentences.en: The defect in the drainage must be remedied.
sentences.cn: 这排水系统的缺陷该设法补救.

sentences.en: The drainage of the city is not good, some of the pipes are broken.
sentences.cn: 这个城市的排水系统不好, 有些排水管都破裂了.

sentences.en: The drainage system has collapsed because of too much rain.
sentences.cn: 由于降雨过多，排水系统已经彻底瘫痪了。

sentences.en: The endless variations of drainage pattern make descriptive characteristics difficult.
sentences.cn: 水系型式的无限变化给描述特征带来了困难.

words.tran_cn: 排水；下水道，排水管；消耗
喝光，耗尽；使流出；排掉水

phrases.tran_cn: 酸性矿水排水；排泄酸性矿水
滤水速度，排水速度；排水比率
排水系统，渠道系统；水系；引流装置
排水工程；渠务工程；排水工作

trans.tran_en: the process or system by which water or waste liquid flows away
